SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Representation of the game. Each player is recognised through the system by their username.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> validUsernames)
      Creates game based on the lobby

    • Game

      public Game(Game gameBeforeCrash)
      Constructs a game using the information stored in gameBeforeCrash. In this way is possible to recover the game's status before the last crash.
      Parameters:
      gameBeforeCrash - the game's status before crashing.

    • add

      public void add(String username, GameListener client) throws InvalidUsernameException
      Adds a client to the game.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      client - to add.
      Throws:
      InvalidUsernameException - if the game has started but the username wasn't registered or if it is already connected in the game.

    • remove

      public void remove(String username) throws InvalidUsernameException
      Removes a username from the game and suspends the game if the number of players is less than two.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player to remove from the player.
      Throws:
      InvalidUsernameException - if the username isn't valid.

    • getPlayerByUsername

      public Player getPlayerByUsername(String username)
      Returns a player based on the username.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      Returns:
      the player.

    • placeStarter

      public void placeStarter(String username, Side side) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the starter on the specified side.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player
      side - of the starter
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform the operation. For example the player has already chosen the side.
      InvalidGamePhaseException

    • assignColor

      public void assignColor(String username, PlayerColor color) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidColorException, NonexistentPlayerException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Assigns at username the specified color.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player who has chose the color.
      color - chosen.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform this action.
      InvalidColorException - if the color has already been selected by others.
      NonexistentPlayerException - if the username is invalid.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the player has already finished their setup.

    • placeObjectiveCard

      public void placeObjectiveCard(String username, int chosenObjective) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the secret objective from one of the two available.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      chosenObjective - the chosen objective. 0 for the first one, 1 for the second one.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform the operation. For example the player has already chosen the objective.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the player has already finished the setup.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String username, Card card, Side side, Position position) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, Playground.UnavailablePositionException, Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidGamePhaseException, SuspendedGameException
      Places the card on the side and position specified.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      card - to place.
      side - of the card.
      position - in the playground
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform the operation.
      Playground.UnavailablePositionException - if the position is not available. For example the player is trying to place the card in an already covered corner.
      Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException - if the player's resource are not enough to place the card.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase cannot allow placing cards.
      SuspendedGameException

    • drawFromDeck

      public void drawFromDeck(String username, DeckType deckType) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, EmptyDeckException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Draws a card from the deck specified.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player to draw.
      deckType - of the deck to draw a card from.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform the operation.
      EmptyDeckException - if the selected deck is empty.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow the operation.

    • drawFromFaceUpCards

      public void drawFromFaceUpCards(String username, int faceUpCardIdx) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException, InvalidFaceUpCardException
      Draws from one of the available face up cards.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      faceUpCardIdx - specifying the face up card.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException - if the player cannot perform the operation.
      InvalidGamePhaseException
      InvalidFaceUpCardException

    • skipTurn

      public void skipTurn(String currentPlayer)
      Skips the current player's turn. The method is invoked whenever the current player is not active.

    • registerMessage

      public void registerMessage(Message message) throws InvalidMessageException
      Registers message sent by author.
      Parameters:
      message - to register.
      Throws:
      InvalidMessageException - if the author doesn't match the sender or the recipient is an invalid username.

    • getActivePlayers

      public List<Player> getActivePlayers()
      Returns a list of active players.
      Returns:
      an active player's list.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(String username, int frontId, int backId) throws InvalidCardIdException
      Gets the card associated to the cardId.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username.
      frontId - the id of the card's front.
      backId - the id of the card's back.
      Returns:
      the player's card associated with cardId.
      Throws:
      InvalidCardIdException

    • terminateForInactivity

      public void terminateForInactivity()

    • getTopDeckBack

      public Face getTopDeckBack(DeckType type)
